- Experience page: Professional achievements and career highlights

- Skills page: Comprehensive expertise and proficiency display
- Education page: Academic background and continuous learning
- Contact page: Professional contact form and information
- Enhanced blog pages with proper back button navigation

Technical Improvements:
- Optimize Inter font configuration with proper fallbacks and preloading
- Fix Next.js config for development vs production environments
- Add proper font preconnect hints and display strategies
- Update navigation component to use Next.js Link routing
- Maintain responsive design and animation consistency
